attributizedskills.tooltip.larval_tear_l: Converts to 12 bottles of experience on use.
attributizedskills.tooltip.larval_tear_o: Just a worthless rock... How pity...
attributizedskills.tooltip.larval_tear_r: Resets all skills on use. Returns xp levels equal to the total amount of levels one had
command.add_bonus.failure.exist: Bonus for attribute %1$s already exists for %2$s
command.add_requirements.failure.wrong_f: Wrong number for skill: %1$s. Level cannot be less than 1.
command.add_requirements.failure.wrong_s: Wrong skill: %1$s. Correct skills: VITALITY, STRENGTH, MIND, DEXTERITY, ENDURANCE, INTELLIGENCE
command.error.remove_all_bonuses: If you see this message, then dev of mod have a severe case of skill issue, and was unable to remove bonuses on live players.
command.remove_bonus.failure: No bonus for attribute %1$s found for %2$s
command.remove_requirements.failure.no_i: You need to hold item in hand!
effect.attributizedskills.atrophy.descri: Severely reduces attack speed, damage, and spell damage.
effect.attributizedskills.encumbered.des: Severely reduces movespeed and prevents jumping. Drains feathers.
larvar_tear.reset_successful: Your skills began to fade away... Skill issue, dear...
overlay.default_message: You lack the skills to use this!
overlay.main_hand_message: Your right arm struggles to wield the item
overlay.off_hand_message: Your left arm struggles to wield the item
ui.skills.hold_shift: Hold SHIFT to level up skill 5 times.
